package PCKG_WIZMEN is

  PROCEDURE create_books_n_seq(parm_book_desc                 VARCHAR2,
                               parm_book_shrt_desc            VARCHAR2,
                               parm_sub_inv_desc              VARCHAR2,
                               parm_inv_doc_type_desc         VARCHAR2,
                               parm_def_cat_struc_desc        VARCHAR2,
                               parm_doc_seq_desc              VARCHAR2,
                               parm_gen_prd_type_desc         VARCHAR2,
                               parm_jrn_type_desc             VARCHAR2,
                               parm_jrn_source_desc           VARCHAR2,
                               parm_jrn_cat_desc              VARCHAR2,
                               parm_config_type_desc          VARCHAR2);

  /*
  parm_book_desc          BOOK DESC TO POPULATE IN INV_BOOKS
  parm_book_shrt_desc     BOOK SHORT DESC TO POPULATE IN INV_BOOKS
  parm_sub_inv_id         SUB INV ID TO POPULATE IN INV_BOOKS
  parm_inv_doc_type_id    DOC_TYPE_ID OF
